# billingContact

**Instance Property**

The user-selected billing address for this transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
var billingContact: PKContact? { get }
```

## Discussion

Only the fields specified in the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest/requiredBillingAddressFields] property of the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest] object are populated. If no required billing fields were specified, the value of this property is `nil`.

## Working with billing and shipping information

- **shippingContact**: The user-selected shipping address for this transaction.
- **shippingMethod**: The user-selected shipping method for this transaction.
- **PKContact**: An object that encapsulates contact information needed for billing and shipping.
- **PKShippingMethod**: An object that defines a shipping method for delivering physical goods.
